thread.title: S&P falls as Mueller subpoena weighs

title: S&P falls as Mueller subpoena weighs
text:
S&P falls as Mueller subpoena weighs Friday, March 16, 2018 - 01:19 
The S&P 500 ended slightly lower after a report that U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller had issued a subpoena for documents related to U.S. President Donald Trump's businesses offset strong jobs and manufacturing data. Aleksandra Michalska reports.   
The S&P 500 ended slightly lower after a report that U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller had issued a subpoena for documents related to U.S. President Donald Trump's businesses offset strong jobs and manufacturing data. Aleksandra Michalska reports.  //reut.rs/2ItlvVf
